comment:
* A builder of {@link AclEntry} objects. * *

A {@code Builder} object is obtained by invoking one of the {@link * AclEntry#newBuilder newBuilder} methods defined by the {@code AclEntry} * class. * *

Builder objects are mutable and are not safe for use by multiple * concurrent threads without appropriate synchronization. * * @since 1.7

methods.name: public AclEntry build()
methods.comment:
* Constructs an {@link AclEntry} from the components of this builder.
         * The type and who components are required to have been set in order
         * to construct an {@code AclEntry}.
         *
         * @return  a new ACL entry
         *
         * @throws  IllegalStateException
         *          if the type or who component have not been set

methods.name: public Builder setType(AclEntryType type)
methods.comment:
* Sets the type component of this builder.
         *
         * @param   type  the component type
         * @return  this builder

methods.name: public Builder setPrincipal(UserPrincipal who)
methods.comment:
* Sets the principal component of this builder.
         *
         * @param   who  the principal component
         * @return  this builder

methods.name: private static void checkSet(Set<?> set, Class<?> type)
methods.comment: check set only contains elements of the given type

methods.name: public Builder setPermissions(Set<AclEntryPermission> perms)
methods.comment:
* Sets the permissions component of this builder. On return, the
         * permissions component of this builder is a copy of the given set.
         *
         * @param   perms  the permissions component
         * @return  this builder
         *
         * @throws  ClassCastException
         *          if the set contains elements that are not of type {@code
         *          AclEntryPermission}

methods.name: public Builder setPermissions(AclEntryPermission... perms)
methods.comment:
* Sets the permissions component of this builder. On return, the
         * permissions component of this builder is a copy of the permissions in
         * the given array.
         *
         * @param   perms  the permissions component
         * @return  this builder

methods.name: public Builder setFlags(Set<AclEntryFlag> flags)
methods.comment:
* Sets the flags component of this builder. On return, the flags
         * component of this builder is a copy of the given set.
         *
         * @param   flags  the flags component
         * @return  this builder
         *
         * @throws  ClassCastException
         *          if the set contains elements that are not of type {@code
         *          AclEntryFlag}

methods.name: public Builder setFlags(AclEntryFlag... flags)
methods.comment:
* Sets the flags component of this builder. On return, the flags
         * component of this builder is a copy of the flags in the given
         * array.
         *
         * @param   flags  the flags component
         * @return  this builder

methodNames: private static void checkSet(Set<?> set, Class<?> type)
